_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Red-DiscordBot
author: friesi@srvb.at
description:
Red is a fully modular bot – meaning all features and commands can be enabled/disabled to your liking, making it completely customizable.
https://github.com/Cog-Creators/Red-DiscordBot

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
#Config generator

apk add --no-cache git wget
cd /mnt/server

echo "\nDownload Red-DiscordBot\n"
git clone -b develop --single-branch https://github.com/Twentysix26/Red-DiscordBot.git

echo "\nDownload default config\n"
mkdir -p /mnt/server/Red-DiscordBot/data/red/
cd /mnt/server/Red-DiscordBot/data/red/
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Friesinator/eggs/master/bots/Discordbot/settings.json

variables.name: Token
variables.description:
Create an application and get the bot token:
https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/
